name: Renter-Occupied Property Letter
content:
Dear {{first_name}},

My name is [Your Name] and I'm writing regarding your rental property at {{property_address}}.

As a local real estate investor, I'm interested in discussing potential opportunities regarding your rental property. I understand the challenges of managing rental properties, especially when they're not in close proximity to your primary residence.

I'd like to discuss options that could potentially provide you with liquidity while alleviating the responsibilities of property management.

If you're open to a conversation, please contact me at [Your Phone Number] or [Your Email].

Thank you for considering my request.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Company]
